verses.verse: Would <S%G3785><s%> to God you could bear <S%G430><s%> with me a little <S%G3397><s%> in my folly: <S%G877><s%> and indeed <S%G235><s%> bear <S%G430><s%> with me.

For I am jealous <S%G2206><s%> over you with godly <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2316><s%> jealousy: <S%G2205><s%> for I have espoused <S%G718><s%> you to one <S%G1520><s%> husband, <S%G435><s%> that I may present <S%G3936><s%> you as a chaste <S%G53><s%> virgin <S%G3933><s%> to Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

But I fear, <S%G5399><s%> lest <S%G3381><s%> by any <S%G3381><s%> means, <S%G4458><s%> as the serpent <S%G3789><s%> beguiled <S%G1818><s%> Eve <S%G2096><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> his subtlety, <S%G3834><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> minds <S%G3540><s%> should be corrupted <S%G5351><s%> from the simplicity <S%G572><s%> that is in Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

For if <S%G1487><s%> he that comes <S%G2064><s%> preaches <S%G2784><s%> another <S%G243><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> we have not preached, <S%G2784><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> if you receive <S%G2983><s%> another <S%G2087><s%> spirit, <S%G4151><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you have not received, <S%G2983><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> another <S%G2087><s%> gospel, <S%G2098><s%> which you have not accepted, <S%G1209><s%> you might well <S%G2573><s%> bear <S%G430><s%> with him.
For I suppose <S%G3049><s%> I was not a whit <S%G3367><s%> behind <S%G5302><s%> the very <S%G5228><s%> most chief <S%G5228><s%> <S%G3029><s%> apostles. <S%G652><s%>

But though <S%G1499><s%> I be rude <S%G2399><s%> in speech, <S%G3056><s%> yet <S%G235><s%> not in knowledge; <S%G1108><s%> but we have been thoroughly <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3956><s%> made <S%G5319><s%> manifest <S%G5319><s%> among <S%G1519><s%> you in all <S%G3956><s%> things.

Have I committed <S%G4160><s%> an offense <S%G266><s%> in abasing <S%G5013><s%> myself <S%G1683><s%> that you might be exalted, <S%G5312><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> I have preached <S%G2097><s%> to you the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> freely? <S%G1432><s%>
I robbed <S%G4813><s%> other <S%G243><s%> churches, <S%G1577><s%> taking <S%G2983><s%> wages <S%G3800><s%> of them, to do you service. <S%G1248><s%>

And when I was present <S%G3918><s%> with you, and wanted, <S%G5302><s%> I was chargeable <S%G2655><s%> to no <S%G3762><s%> man: <S%G3762><s%> for that which was lacking <S%G5303><s%> to me the brothers <S%G80><s%> which came <S%G2064><s%> from Macedonia <S%G3109><s%> supplied: <S%G4322><s%> and in all <S%G3956><s%> things I have kept <S%G5083><s%> myself <S%G1683><s%> from being burdensome <S%G4><s%> to you, and so will I keep <S%G5083><s%> myself. <S%G1683><s%>

As the truth <S%G225><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> is in me, no <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3762><s%> man shall stop <S%G5420><s%> me of this <S%G3778><s%> boasting <S%G2746><s%> in the regions <S%G2824><s%> of Achaia. <S%G882><s%>
Why? <S%G1302><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> I love <S%G25><s%> you not? God <S%G2316><s%> knows. <S%G1492><s%>

But what <S%G3739><s%> I do, <S%G4160><s%> that I will do, <S%G4160><s%> that I may cut <S%G1581><s%> off <S%G1581><s%> occasion <S%G874><s%> from them which desire <S%G2309><s%> occasion; <S%G874><s%> that wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3757><s%> they glory, <S%G2744><s%> they may be found <S%G2147><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> as we.

For such <S%G5108><s%> are false <S%G5570><s%> apostles, <S%G5570><s%> deceitful <S%G1386><s%> workers, <S%G2040><s%> transforming <S%G3345><s%> themselves into <S%G1519><s%> the apostles <S%G652><s%> of Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
And no <S%G3762><s%> marvel; <S%G2298><s%> for Satan <S%G4567><s%> himself <S%G846><s%> is transformed <S%G3345><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> an angel <S%G32><s%> of light. <S%G5457><s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> it is no <S%G3762><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> thing if <S%G1499><s%> his ministers <S%G1249><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> be transformed <S%G3345><s%> as the ministers <S%G1249><s%> of righteousness; <S%G1343><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> end <S%G5056><s%> shall be according <S%G2596><s%> to their works. <S%G2041><s%>

I say <S%G3004><s%> again, <S%G3825><s%> Let no <S%G3367><s%> man <S%G5100><s%> think <S%G1380><s%> me a fool; <S%G878><s%> if <S%G1490><s%> otherwise, <S%G1490><s%> yet <S%G2579><s%> as a fool <S%G878><s%> receive <S%G1209><s%> me, that I may boast <S%G2744><s%> myself a little. <S%G3397><s%>

That which <S%G3739><s%> I speak, <S%G2980><s%> I speak <S%G2980><s%> it not after <S%G2596><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> but as it were foolishly, <S%G1722><s%> <S%G877><s%> in this <S%G5026><s%> confidence <S%G5287><s%> of boasting. <S%G2746><s%>
Seeing <S%G1893><s%> that many <S%G4183><s%> glory <S%G2744><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> I will glory <S%G2744><s%> also. <S%G2504><s%>
For you suffer <S%G430><s%> fools <S%G878><s%> gladly, <S%G2234><s%> seeing you yourselves are wise. <S%G5429><s%>

For you suffer, <S%G430><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> bring <S%G2615><s%> you into bondage, <S%G2615><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> devour <S%G2719><s%> you, if <S%G1487><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> take <S%G2983><s%> of you, if <S%G1487><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> exalt <S%G1869><s%> himself, if <S%G1487><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> smite <S%G1194><s%> you on <S%G1519><s%> the face. <S%G4383><s%>

I speak <S%G3004><s%> as concerning <S%G2596><s%> reproach, <S%G819><s%> as though <S%G3754><s%> we had been weak. <S%G770><s%> However, when ever <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> is bold, <S%G5111><s%> (I speak <S%G3004><s%> foolishly, <S%G1722><s%> <S%G877><s%>) I am bold also. <S%G5111><s%> <S%G2504><s%>
Are they Hebrews? <S%G1445><s%> so <S%G2504><s%> am I. Are they Israelites? <S%G2475><s%> so <S%G2504><s%> am I. Are they the seed <S%G4690><s%> of Abraham? <S%G11><s%> so <S%G2504><s%> am I.

Are they ministers <S%G1249><s%> of Christ? <S%G5547><s%> (I speak <S%G2980><s%> as a fool) <S%G3912><s%> I am more; <S%G5228><s%> in labors <S%G2873><s%> more <S%G4056><s%> abundant, <S%G4056><s%> in stripes <S%G4127><s%> above <S%G5234><s%> measure, <S%G5234><s%> in prisons <S%G5438><s%> more <S%G4056><s%> frequent, <S%G4056><s%> in deaths <S%G2288><s%> oft. <S%G4178><s%>
Of the Jews <S%G2453><s%> five <S%G3999><s%> times <S%G3999><s%> received <S%G2983><s%> I forty <S%G5062><s%> stripes save <S%G3844><s%> one. <S%G3391><s%>

Thrice <S%G5151><s%> was I beaten <S%G4463><s%> with rods, <S%G4463><s%> once <S%G530><s%> was I stoned, <S%G3034><s%> thrice <S%G5151><s%> I suffered shipwreck, <S%G3489><s%> a night <S%G3574><s%> and a day <S%G3574><s%> I have been <S%G4160><s%> in the deep; <S%G1037><s%>

In journeys <S%G3597><s%> often, <S%G3740><s%> in perils <S%G2794><s%> of waters, <S%G4215><s%> in perils <S%G2794><s%> of robbers, <S%G3027><s%> in perils <S%G2794><s%> by my own countrymen, <S%G1085><s%> in perils <S%G2794><s%> by the heathen, <S%G1484><s%> in perils <S%G2794><s%> in the city, <S%G4172><s%> in perils <S%G2794><s%> in the wilderness, <S%G2047><s%> in perils <S%G2794><s%> in the sea, <S%G2281><s%> in perils <S%G2794><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> false <S%G5569><s%> brothers; <S%G5569><s%>

In weariness <S%G2873><s%> and painfulness, <S%G3449><s%> in watchings <S%G70><s%> often, <S%G3740><s%> in hunger <S%G3042><s%> and thirst, <S%G1373><s%> in fastings <S%G3521><s%> often, <S%G3740><s%> in cold <S%G5592><s%> and nakedness. <S%G1132><s%>

Beside <S%G5565><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> things that are without, <S%G3924><s%> that which <S%G3588><s%> comes <S%G1999><s%> on me daily, <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2250><s%> the care <S%G3308><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> the churches. <S%G1577><s%>
Who <S%G5101><s%> is weak, <S%G770><s%> and I am not weak? <S%G770><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> is offended, <S%G4624><s%> and I burn <S%G4448><s%> not?
If <S%G1487><s%> I must <S%G1163><s%> needs glory, <S%G2744><s%> I will glory <S%G2744><s%> of the things which concern <S%G4012><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> infirmities. <S%G769><s%>

The God <S%G2316><s%> and Father <S%G3962><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is blessed <S%G2128><s%> for ever more, <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165><s%> knows <S%G1492><s%> that I lie <S%G5574><s%> not.

In Damascus <S%G1154><s%> the governor <S%G1481><s%> under Aretas <S%G702><s%> the king <S%G935><s%> kept <S%G5432><s%> the city <S%G4172><s%> of the Damascenes <S%G1153><s%> with a garrison, <S%G5432><s%> desirous <S%G2309><s%> to apprehend <S%G4084><s%> me:
And through <S%G1223><s%> a window <S%G2376><s%> in a basket <S%G4553><s%> was I let <S%G5465><s%> down <S%G5465><s%> by the wall, <S%G5038><s%> and escaped <S%G1628><s%> his hands. <S%G5495><s%>
